name: Zulay Kitchen Rotary Cheese Grater 5 Blade Cheese Shredder - Manual Hand Crank Cheese Grater With Reinforced Suction & 5 Interchangeable Drums - Easy to Use, Vegetable Chopper Round Mandoline Slicer
short_description: SAFE TO USE CHEESE GRATER: No more injuries! This rotary cheese grater is designed with easy to install blades that don’t require you to touch the blade directly. It also comes with a food pusher that keeps your hand away from the blades and lets you add more food into the wide hopper. This vegetable shredder is made from BPA-free, food-grade materials, making it safe to use. SAVE TIME AND EFFORT: If you love freshly grated cheese but don't want to put in a lot of effort, then this cheese grater with handle is just what you need. Simply rotate the handle to shred cheese 18 times faster than cutting cheese by hand; it is designed for both left and right handed people. Grate like a pro with our easy-to-use rotary cheese grater with handle. GRATE, SLICE, AND SHRED: With 5 interchangeable stainless steel blades, this rotary grater is perfect for thin and wavy vegetable slicing, coarse shredding, and fine and coarse julienne. The sharp blades of this multifunctional grater are perfect for grating with carrots, cucumbers, potatoes, nuts, cookies, and even a soft block of cheese. EASY TO CLEAN AND STORE: The hopper and blades, which handle most of the mess, are dishwasher safe for hassle-free cleaning. The base, handle, and food pusher can be quickly wiped clean. Plus, it comes with a compact storage box, keeping everything neatly organized and easily accessible in your kitchen cabinet. FUNCTIONAL DESIGN: The powerful suction base securely attaches to a clean and dry surface, preventing the food shredder from falling over. The transparent barrel is slightly inclined to prevent clogging and allow the food to come out smoothly. HASSLE-FREE, ZULAY GUARANTEE: We are a Family Owned USA Business that believes in providing customers with the best-quality products. Our cheese shredder is backed with a lifetime warranty. If there are any issues, just contact us, and we will always be available to make it right.

name: Vegetable Spiralizer 4in1 Rotating Blade Veggie Spiralizer Zucchini Noodle Maker with Strong Suction Cup Spiral Vegetable Cutter Slicer
short_description: 4 IN 1 ROTARY CHANGABLE BLADE - Different blade types can be selected by rotating the roller to make vegetables of different shapes. The vertical design can better play the role of gravity, helping you save more time and effort during cooking preparation. You only need to cut the vegetables into suitable lengths (less than 4 inches), then you can start enjoying the fun of vegetable cutting. HEALTHIER EATING - Using Maxceysen vegetable spiralizer, you can make vegetable pasta quickly and easily. Perfect for those on a gluten-free, low-carb, raw, or low-fat diet. The veggie spiralizer is ideal for slicing carrots, potatoes, zucchini, sweet potatoes, cucumber, and more. COMPACT & EASY CLEANING - Maxceysen veggie spiralizer is compact in size, which is suitable for storage in cabinets. Blades are made of 420 stainless steel, durable and sharp. Comes with a 2 CUP container, to avoid the mess in the kitchen. All parts of our fuselage can be easily disassembled and washed, please put it in a dry place to dry after washing. SAFE USING - You can use Maxceysen spiralizer without touching the blade, use the scroll wheel to select the blade. Vegetables shredding and your hands' operation are completely separated. The base is equipped with a strong suction cup, please lock the suction cup before use. The stable base can effectively prevent accidents in the kitchen. 100% SATISFIED SERVICE - Please read the manual carefully before use and assemble it correctly. The blade is sharp, please do not touch the blade with your fingers! If you have any questions about use or find product quality issues, please do not hesitate to contact us, and we will help you solve the problems in time.

name: Handheld Spiralizer Vegetable Slicer,4 in 1 Heavy Duty Veggie Spiralizer Zucchini Spaghetti Maker,Vegatable Spiral Slicer for Salad,Carrot,Fruit,Cucumber,Zucchini,Onion Noodle Maker (Gray)

name: KitchenAid Stand Mixer Attachment, KSM1APC Fruit and Vegetable Spiralizer
short_description: Connect to any household KitchenAid Stand Mixer power hub and use the power of the motor to run the spiralizer attachment. sold separately. Includes 5 quick-change blades so you can be creative with fresh ingredients. Spiralizing (Medium and Fine), Slicing (Large and Small Core), and an optional Peeling Blade. Premium metal construction provides durable long lasting performance, and when attached to the stand mixer, provides stability and ease of use. The attachment and accessories fit inside its own storage case, designed for easy access and simple storage. All blades are top-rack dishwasher safe and the attachment body can be wiped clean with a warm, damp cloth.
product_description: Whether you're looking to freshen up your classic recipes or craving to try something new, it's easy to be creative with the KitchenAid® Spiralizer Attachment. This attachment offers the versatility to peel, core, slice and spiralize a variety of fruits and vegetables. Start by spiralizing zucchini, sweet potatoes, even vibrant, earthy beets, or slice fresh apple or pears for a savory dessert.

name: Ourokhome Vegetable Spiralizer Zucchini Noodles Maker – 4 Built-in Spiral Slicer Blade for Veggie Spaghetti Paste
short_description: Vertical Structure Zucchini Spaghetti Maker: There is no need to sideway pressure thanks to the vertical structure. Under the action of gravity, the zoodle maker works with effortless. Space Save Spiral Vegetable Cutter: one knob control 4 blades, there is no headache about storage blades and install blades. You can quickly choose the blades you want, and it will save you much time. Impressive Kitchen Spiralizer: With Ourokhome spiralizer, you can make and enjoy healthy, low-fat, gluten free, raw and low carb diet from vegetables and fruits in a quick and easy way! The spiralizer vegetable slicer is perfect for onion, potato, zucchini, sweet potato, squansh and so on. Easy to Operation and Clean: The big suction cup makes the spiral zucchini cutter steady when operation, it will save much labor. The spiralizer hard vegetable slicer is hand wash easily with the cleaning brush (included). Easy to Storage: It is very fit for small kitchen.

name: Japanese Turning Vegetable Spiralizer, Veggie Spiralizer For Fresh Zucchini, Squash, Butternut Squash with 1 Straight-Edged Blade and 3 Serrated Blades Multiple
short_description: Great for creating garnish for drinks, sushi and salad, this turning slicer has one straight-edge blade for making wide slices and three different serrated blades (to insert when needed for making fine, medium or coarse garnishes, according to the number of teeth on the blade (more teeth meaning narrower spaces for finer strands) Multiple uses: zucchini noodle maker , spiralizer for veggies, cuts ribbons of squash, butternut squash, sweet potato, slices of onion, spirals of beet, strings of radish, slivers of carrot, strips of cabbage, and strands of potato. Health-promoting: more nutrients in your diet, more empty carbs out of it. Professional quality for restaurants and commercial kitchens — 50 servings made in 5 minutes — yet simple enough to use at home. Stainless steel blades, with two adjacent anti-skid rubber feet on one side of the cutter and two adjacent projections on other side of the cutter that, when placed over the edge of table or cutting board, keep the cutter from sliding forward when you press into the handle to keep the food in place Made from tough ABS and nylon reinforced resin, almost unbreakable; easy to clean (not dishwasher safe)

name: KEOUKE Vegetable Spiralizer & Zucchini Noodle Maker - 3 In 1 Adjustable Spiral Slicer with BPA-Free Plastic & Clear Bowl, Effortless for Cucumber, Potato, Carrot
short_description: Effortless Vertical Operation: Designed for tabletop stability with a non-slip base, KEOUKE vegetable spiralizer bowel uses vertical pressure mechanics to convert downward force into precise cuts. The ergonomic handle aligns with natural wrist motion, requiring 40% less effort than traditional side-twist spiralizers while maintaining full control. One-Wheel Blade Selector: Innovative unidirectional wheeln of the zucchini spiralizer seamlessly cycles through 3 blades without disassembly. Simply rotate the textured dial (clockwise only) to click between 0.2" fine shredding, 0.3" shredding, and 1.4" flat cuts. Safety lock prevents accidental blade changes during use. Veggie Prep Guidance: Optimize results by pre-cutting produce to 3-inch lengths. This patented length specification ensures smooth feeding, prevents jams, and maximizes yield - 1 medium zucchini makes 2.5 cups of healthy veggie noodles in 18 seconds. Dishwasher-Safe Construction: KEOUKE zoodler spiralizer features commercial-grade 420 stainless steel blades (HRC52 hardness) resistant to rust and dulling. All plastic components use food-certified ABS material, while the crystal-clear collection bowl detaches with one pull for effortless cleanup. Multi-Veg Mastery: This zucchini noodle maker engineer for firm using: creates zucchini "zoodles", cucumber ribbons, sweet potato curly fries, and even juliennes carrots for slaws. Compact 7.1x6.7-inch footprint stores vertically in drawers. Includes blade guard and non-slip mat for countertop protection.

name: NutriChef 3-in-1 Electric Vegetable Chopper, Spiralizer, and Salad Maker - Fruit Cutter, Spiral Shredder Machine, Veggie Spaghetti & Noodle Maker | Includes Food Plunger & 1.2L Bowl
short_description: 3-IN-1 FOOD CUTTING TOOL: The NutriChef 3-in-1 Food Spiralizer can slice, chop, and create stringy spirals perfect for salads, vegetable garnishes, pastas, noodles, and more! It's an exciting way to encourage kids to eat their veggies. CORD DESIGN: This veggie chopper processor features a simple electronic plug-in design with a 3.3 ft power cord length, ensuring safe tabletop or countertop placement. Impress your guests and serve stunning salads with this upgraded fruit and vegetable slicer. 3 CUTTING BLADES: It features three switchable cutter blades - coarse, fine chop, and spiral style cutting blades, catering to your salad and cooking needs. Additionally, it includes a bowl to collect cut and spiralized food, ready to serve or cook. REMOVABLE PARTS: All parts are detachable from the main unit, including the food plunger, feeder chute, cutter blades, drive sleeve, and beaker, facilitating proper cleaning and storage. Wash everything in warm soapy water, excluding the main unit. FOOD GRADE CONSTRUCTION: The electric home gourmet slicer shredder boasts safe food-grade construction, crafted from engineered ABS plastic and stainless steel blades. The collection bowl has a generous capacity of 1.2 liters.
product_description: Introducing our Electric Food Spiralizer - the ultimate kitchen companion for effortlessly transforming your fruits and veggies into tantalizing spirals of culinary delight. Crafted for convenience and creativity, this Electric Food Processor Spiralizer peels and slices with precision, yielding perfect stringy spirals that will elevate your dishes to gourmet status. Impress your guests with stunning salads adorned with intricate vegetable garnishes or delight the little ones by turning mealtime into a fun-filled adventure of colorful pasta noodles. With three changeable cutting blades included, you have the flexibility to create assorted spiral sizes, catering to all your culinary whims. Designed for ease of use, simply plug in and watch as this spiral slicer works its magic. And cleanup is a breeze with dishwasher-safe removable parts, ensuring that maintaining this kitchen essential is as effortless as its operation. Constructed with food-grade materials and engineered for safety, you can confidently place it on any kitchen table or countertop. In the box, you'll find the Electric Spiralizer, three cutting blades, and a generous 1.2-liter collection cup, ready to unleash your culinary creativity. Technical specifications include durable stainless steel and engineered ABS construction, a 3.3-foot power cord for flexible placement, and dimensions of 7.9 x 5.9 x 14.5 inches, making it a compact yet powerful addition to your kitchen arsenal. Elevate your cooking experience with our Electric Food Spiralizer and revolutionize the way you prepare and present your favorite dishes.

name: MasterChef Electric Spiralizer- 3-in-1 Vegetable Noodle Pasta Maker-Homemade Low Carb, Keto, Vegan, Gluten Free Pasta -Zoodle Zucchini Veggie Slicer and XL Hopper (w FREE Recipe Guide)
short_description: Electric Spiralizer- Spiralize your favorite vegetables Vegetable Pasta Maker- Three cones allow you to create spaghetti, fettuccine or ribbon-style noodles Zoodle Maker- Make meal time healthy by getting creative and mixing in your favorite veggies Features Extra Large Hopper to catch your veggie noodles and pasta
